summary: I swear if they make TJ Kippen do any of that Jonah Beck heterosexual wack this Friday, I might just have to take a break from...
body:
I swear if they make TJ Kippen do any of that Jonah Beck heterosexual wack this Friday, I might just have to take a break from Andi Mack✌🏻 all I want is my Tyrus babies to be happy 💗🏳️‍🌈 they are so in love.

That is all.

summary: Tyrus/Muffy/Ambi sleep over head cannons?
question: Tyrus/Muffy/Ambi sleep over head cannons?
answer:
the girls would all start painting their nails. pink for Amber, periwinkle for Andi, nude/beige for Buffy. Cyrus would shyly ask for the girls to paint his nails, which Amber picks out a light green color (it would match TJ’s eyes of course) and to show his support for his boyfriend TJ goes for a dark purple color and starts messily painting his own. Marty decides to join in the fun and has Buffy paint his nails black.

Andi teachs Cyrus how to braid hair who laughs and turns to TJ, making small braids throughout the long parts of his hair.

Marty and Buffy have a little competition of who can go the longest without getting scared during a scary movie.

Tyrus and Ambi just laugh at them and stay cuddle up on the couch, sharing the popcorn and pizza.

they decide to do face masks, Marty trying out the peel off mask who immediately takes to washing it off his face as soon as he begins peeling it.

somehow they all convince Cyrus to bake brownies (homemade, none of that store bought box stuff)

Andi teaches them all how to make different crafts, even though all of them lose interest quickly (except for Amber who watches her girlfriend in amazement)

Amber and Cyrus make up a little dance and then performs it for everyone, it eventually turning into a dance party. Tyrus dancing awkwardly in the corner, TJ occasionally leaning in to kiss his boyfriend, Buffy trying to outdo her boyfriend, Amber spinning Andi in small circles before going back to slow dancing

summary: peyton is nominated for a kids choice award!
question: peyton is nominated for a kids choice award!
answer:
Interesting that it’s still the only nomination Andi Mack received, meanwhile Raven’s Home and Bunk’d got nominations in both the favorite actor categories (alongside Peyton) as well as favorite show categories, which Andi Mack did not get nominated for. Also interesting that Karan Brar would be the only male Disney Channel star nominated for favorite actor when Asher Angel exists. Looks very much like Disney could be prioritizing the focus toward the shows that are already confirmed for renewal (Bunk’d, Raven’s Home) but they haven’t completely let go of AM yet either so. Yeah. I don’t know what, if anything, it means, but it’s still interesting.

I mean, like I’ve said before - Kids Choice Awards are bullshit. The nominees and winners are mostly based on who agrees to be a part of the show, or whose management is willing to pay for the award. Since she is nominated alongside Raven, Millie, and Zendaya - it’s safe to assume that if any of them attend the awards, Peyton probably will not win. But at the very least hopefully she will still attend the awards (she has in the past without being nominated so) and maybe some of the other cast members will come along just because so that’ll be fun because content. I think it’s around the same time as the GLAAD Awards so hopefully we’ll be well fed that week.

summary: There's some updates to Disney Channel's Schedule for February 25-March 3. The changes are on Wednesday, February 27 where an...
caption: There’s some updates to Disney Channel’s Schedule for February 25-March 3. The changes are on Wednesday, February 27 where an encore of the DCOM, Kim Possible (2019) at 7 PM was replaced with Raven’s Home, Coop & Cami, and Sydney to the Max and on Friday, March 1 where more reruns of Gigantosaurus airs at 12 PM and 1 PM.

blog.name: i-am-church-the-cat
blog.title: Pocky, Pineapples, And Pomegranate Seeds
blog.description:
I’m an aromantic cherub with anxiety.

Skylar | She/Her | 14 | Pan/Aro (Credit to judgmental-llama on tumblr for my icon)

summary: First I love you's for ambi?
question: First I love you's for ambi?
answer:
sorry it’s a little short

–


If the park was TJ and Cyrus’s spot was the park, then Andi’s and Amber’s was the lake. It was the first place the hung out without anything major happened. It was where Amber had taken Andi on their first date, and it was where they had their first kiss. It made sense that the next big step in their relationship would happen here, even if neither of them had seen it coming. The events of that night would be ingrained in their minds forever, even after high school.

Andi had(with Bowie’s help) made a picnic for them. It consisted of Caprese sandwiches, potato salad, strawberry yogurt salad cups, strawberry lemon cookies, a bottle of sparkling grape cider, and Cookie’s name cookies(via the overnight postal service in honor of the girls’ six month anniversary). It was the first homemade meal either of them had had in a while, Andi’s family usually too lazy and Amber usually out with her friends or Andi, so they both thoroughly enjoyed the meal.   

After that, they lay together on the blanket Andi had knitted when she was first learning and watched a bunch of cheesy rom-coms on Amber’s computer. They weren’t really watching them though, more invested in talking about Andi’s newest project. The younger girl was working on a mural that she and Walker had gotten permission to paint on one of the school’s walls.

“I just don’t know what to do”, the girl was saying. “It’s like I have too many ideas in my head, you know?’

Amber nodded her head as she watched her girlfriend ramble on, a twinkle in her eye that only appeared when she was talking about art. Amber remembered the first craft Andi had made her after they had started dating. Amber had been walking to her locker, kept up the night before by her parent’s insistent arguing. Coffee seemed to have no effect and she had at least two tests that day. She was screwed.

When she opened her locker, she saw a small box sitting on the middle shelf, a post-it note stuck on top. Amber had pulled it out slowly and examined the note. It said: Happy two weeks, babe. ~Andi. Amber smiled as she opened the small box to see to round glass earrings. The earrings were painted to look like the lesbian flag and Amber’s smile grew two sizes. She had been telling Andi how she had been trying to find more LGBT+ jewelry, but the two stores in this town were punk and preppy, so Amber had resigned herself to scouring the internet. Who knew they had such good shipping?    

Amber took out the small gold hoops she had put in that day and traded them for her girlfriend’s considerate gift. After checking herself once in the small magnet mirror in her locker, she grabbed her books and headed to class. She aced all THREE of her tests that day, empowered by pure lesbian energy and love pouring from her earrings.

Amber smiled softly at the memory. They were the first of many pride jewelry as more and more of their friends came out, but they were the only ones that Amber knew of that seemed to have magical powers. She reached up to rub the smooth glass of them now as Andi looked at her expectantly. Oh, she had missed something.

“What?”, Amber asked, coming out of her trance. Andi huffed but repeated the question.“Do you want to start heading back? It’s getting kind of dark. And cold”, Andi added with a shiver. Amber grinned and pulled her girlfriend closer, wrapping her and her in her arms. “Don’t worry Bambi, I’ll keep you warm”, she answered pressing a kiss to the younger girls lips. They continued to trade kisses as the moon rose over them and shone down on the lake. 

“I love you”, Andi murmured against Amber’s lips. 

“What?”, Amber breathed, surprised. It took a moment for Andi to realize what she said, but when she remembered, a blush spread across her chicks. 

“I-I’m sorry”, she stuttered. “I didn’t mean to say that out loud, I’ve just been thinking about it a lot recently and I really like you I-I, I love you.” Andi raised her eyes hesitantly to Amber’s scared of what she might see. But Amber was beaming. She had been wanting to hear, wanted to say, those words for months now. She gave the shy girl another deep kiss.

“I love you, too, Andi. So much.” The girl broke out into a huge smile and Amber knew that she had never seen anything she loved more.

sorry it’s a little short

–


If the park was TJ and Cyrus’s spot was the park, then Andi’s and Amber’s was the lake. It was the first place the hung out without anything major happened. It was where Amber had taken Andi on their first date, and it was where they had their first kiss. It made sense that the next big step in their relationship would happen here, even if neither of them had seen it coming. The events of that night would be ingrained in their minds forever, even after high school.

Andi had(with Bowie’s help) made a picnic for them. It consisted of Caprese sandwiches, potato salad, strawberry yogurt salad cups, strawberry lemon cookies, a bottle of sparkling grape cider, and Cookie’s name cookies(via the overnight postal service in honor of the girls’ six month anniversary). It was the first homemade meal either of them had had in a while, Andi’s family usually too lazy and Amber usually out with her friends or Andi, so they both thoroughly enjoyed the meal.   

After that, they lay together on the blanket Andi had knitted when she was first learning and watched a bunch of cheesy rom-coms on Amber’s computer. They weren’t really watching them though, more invested in talking about Andi’s newest project. The younger girl was working on a mural that she and Walker had gotten permission to paint on one of the school’s walls.

“I just don’t know what to do”, the girl was saying. “It’s like I have too many ideas in my head, you know?’

Amber nodded her head as she watched her girlfriend ramble on, a twinkle in her eye that only appeared when she was talking about art. Amber remembered the first craft Andi had made her after they had started dating. Amber had been walking to her locker, kept up the night before by her parent’s insistent arguing. Coffee seemed to have no effect and she had at least two tests that day. She was screwed.

When she opened her locker, she saw a small box sitting on the middle shelf, a post-it note stuck on top. Amber had pulled it out slowly and examined the note. It said: Happy two weeks, babe. ~Andi. Amber smiled as she opened the small box to see to round glass earrings. The earrings were painted to look like the lesbian flag and Amber’s smile grew two sizes. She had been telling Andi how she had been trying to find more LGBT+ jewelry, but the two stores in this town were punk and preppy, so Amber had resigned herself to scouring the internet. Who knew they had such good shipping?    

Amber took out the small gold hoops she had put in that day and traded them for her girlfriend’s considerate gift. After checking herself once in the small magnet mirror in her locker, she grabbed her books and headed to class. She aced all THREE of her tests that day, empowered by pure lesbian energy and love pouring from her earrings.

Amber smiled softly at the memory. They were the first of many pride jewelry as more and more of their friends came out, but they were the only ones that Amber knew of that seemed to have magical powers. She reached up to rub the smooth glass of them now as Andi looked at her expectantly. Oh, she had missed something.

“What?”, Amber asked, coming out of her trance. Andi huffed but repeated the question.“Do you want to start heading back? It’s getting kind of dark. And cold”, Andi added with a shiver. Amber grinned and pulled her girlfriend closer, wrapping her and her in her arms. “Don’t worry Bambi, I’ll keep you warm”, she answered pressing a kiss to the younger girls lips. They continued to trade kisses as the moon rose over them and shone down on the lake. 

“I love you”, Andi murmured against Amber’s lips. 

“What?”, Amber breathed, surprised. It took a moment for Andi to realize what she said, but when she remembered, a blush spread across her chicks. 

“I-I’m sorry”, she stuttered. “I didn’t mean to say that out loud, I’ve just been thinking about it a lot recently and I really like you I-I, I love you.” Andi raised her eyes hesitantly to Amber’s scared of what she might see. But Amber was beaming. She had been wanting to hear, wanted to say, those words for months now. She gave the shy girl another deep kiss.

“I love you, too, Andi. So much.” The girl broke out into a huge smile and Amber knew that she had never seen anything she loved more.

trail.content_raw:
sorry it’s a little short

–

tags: sorry I still suck at these
but I'm trying to get better
summary: Bowling Date!
title: Bowling Date!
body:
Muffy and Tyrus bowling double date

  • Buffy and Marty obviously try and turn it into a competition
  • Cyrus has never been bowling before and he’s not the best at it
  • His ball keeps going into the gutter when he bowls
  • TJ helps cyrus bowl
  • They have a cliche guy-stands-behind-crush-arm-grab-to-move-it-through-a-throwing-motion moment 
  • By some chance, Cyrus manages to get a strike
  • He runs up to TJ with such bright eyes and TJ can’t help but get butterflies in his stomach
  • Marty and Buffy have to fake cough several times to get them to get back to the game
  •  TJ ends up getting the highest score (much to Buffy and Marty’s Chagrin and much to Cyrus’ amazement) 
  • The four of them get pizza and milkshakes afterwards
  • TJ and Cyrus share a vanilla milkshake 
  • They spent most of their time with heart eyes. Buffy and Marty sigh and go along with it
  • They decide to try and make it a tradition to get the 4 of them together and go bowling every year
  • For the most part, they succeed
